eu.smartdatalake.simsearch.csv.spatial

Class LocationReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.smartdatalake.simsearch.csv.spatial.LocationReader

  • public class LocationReader
extends java.lang.Object
    Consumes data from a CSV file and extracts location values from two specific attributes. Locations (as geometries) are maintained in a hash table taking their keys from another attribute in the file. An R-tree index may be created from the collected (key,location) pairs.

      LocationReader()

      Provides a binary geometry representation from the given WGS84 lon/lat geographical coordinates.

      Creates a dictionary of (key,geometry) pairs of all items read from a CSV file ASSUMPTION: Input data collection only contains POINT locations referenced in WGS84.

      Reading spatial attribute data (POINT locations only) from a table in a dBMS over a JDBC connection.
